item.title: Gentoo with DM-Crypt LUKS and EFI (Work In Progress)
item.description: This article serves as somekind of meta instruction for installing Gentoo with DM-Crypt LUKS. The guide is heavily based upon Sakaki’s EFI Install Guide: https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Sakaki%27s_EFI_Install_Guide If this is your first time installing Gentoo it’s probably a better idea to follow Sakaki’s EFI Install Guide, or follow Gentoo’s Handbook: https:/wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Handbook:AMD64/Full/Installation Burn Minimal Installation CD to USB Download the Minimal Installation CD from: https://www.gentoo.org/downloads/ Write the ISO to the USB drive using DD:
